statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 0 \\ -8 \\ 6 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 29 \\ -2 \\ 18 \\ -19 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 28 \\ 2 \\ 24 \\ -20 \\ 30 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
